definition: A formula is a mathematical expression intended to determine a numerical value to be applied dynamically to a certain property.

paragraphs.text: In the context of the trading engine, formulas are used to create user defined statistics.
Formulas may use indicators and object properties made available by the trading engine. They must evaluate to a number.
To learn how to write formulas, see syntax overview.
To add the formula node, select Add Missing Items on the parent node menu.
